bill_title: Commending the South Dakota National Guard 82nd Civil Support Team of Rapid City, South Dakota, on being awarded the General John J. Pershing Trophy and for its continued demonstration of support to the local community and the state.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Commending the South Dakota National Guard 82nd Civil Support Team of Rapid City, South Dakota, on being awarded the General John J. Pershing Trophy and for its continued demonstration of support to the local community and the state. WHEREAS, the South Dakota National Guard 82nd Civil Support Team was awarded the General John J. Pershing Trophy in 2016; and WHEREAS, the General John J. Pershing Trophy is presented to the unit in each Army area attaining the highest figure of merit in the nation during annual weapons qualification firing with assigned individual weapons: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Second Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature expresses its respect, commendation, and congratulations to the South Dakota National Guard 82nd Civil Support Team for receiving the General John J. Pershing Trophy and recognizes the team for its outstanding service to the great State of South Dakota and the United States of America.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Commending the South Dakota National Guard 82nd Civil Support Team of Rapid City, South Dakota, on being awarded the General John J. Pershing Trophy and for its continued demonstration of support to the local community and the state. WHEREAS, the South Dakota National Guard 82nd Civil Support Team was awarded the General John J. Pershing Trophy in 2016; and WHEREAS, the General John J. Pershing Trophy is presented to the unit in each Army area attaining the highest figure of merit in the nation during annual weapons qualification firing with assigned individual weapons: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Second Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature expresses its respect, commendation, and congratulations to the South Dakota National Guard 82nd Civil Support Team for receiving the General John J. Pershing Trophy and recognizes the team for its outstanding service to the great State of South Dakota and the United States of America. 100 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.161 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
